Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the significance of the WHO recruitment on Facebook by implying that it is a widespread occurrence when it is actually a rare event.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide sufficient evidence or support to prove that the WHO is actively recruiting on Facebook.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the post shared on Facebook is a genuine WHO 2020 application form and portal registration, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The WHO and its Nigerian arm have explicitly denied any affiliation with the recruitment portal, suggesting that there may be alternative explanations for the post shared on Facebook.
